name: A Day in Time
description:
--- Brief ---
"A Day in Time" was created from scratch by Lucy Ayling and Andy Buck for the GJL Game Parade 2020. Jump into a 2D platformer that takes you to the pyramids of Ancient Egypt, the cities of Ancient Greece, and the fields of Ancient Rome. All in just one day, thanks to Calen's new machine, designed specifically for exploring, kickin' butt, and saving the world.

--- Controls ---
Keyboard & Mouse:
WASD - Move
Space Bar - Jump
F - Interact
Mouse Button 1 - Attack

Controller:
Left Thumbstick - Move
A - Jump
Right D-PAD - Interact
X - Attack

--- Team ---
Lucy Ayling (Art, Animation):
Andy Buck (Design, Tech):

--- Install Instructions ---
To install, click the Download button below, unpack the .zip file anywhere on your computer, and load up the .exe file within. Thank you for playing!
